review: Got this free with a trial of SlingTV. Overall usefulness is OK. Just OK. The limitations of this USB device shows with speed, image quality and sound quality. Oh, and SlingTV on the FireStick is mediocre and for some reason the sound levels never seemed to be optimal for SlingTV. Also got tired of the constant disconnects from my wifi router. I disconnected, and replaced with a Roku3, very happy with the performance improvement.
author: Henry Kim "Xsnirvana"
